alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 8:04AM EST until December 12 at 7:30PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Hallowell. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Parking lots along Front Street begin to flood. Town dock begins to flood. At 13.0 feet, Water enters the back side of buildings along Water Street. Front Street becomes completely submerged. The parking lot by town dock flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:50 AM EST Monday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this evening to 12.9 feet late tonight. It will fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
